gist.summary: Introduces a new OpenAI-compatible Text-to-Speech endpoint powered by ElevenLabs, complete with voice mapping and transparent pricing.
gist.impact: Developers can now generate high-quality speech audio using standard OpenAI libraries, accessing premium ElevenLabs voices directly through Pollinations.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a radio host or podcaster. Key symbols: Retro microphone, headphones, sound waves. The bee is broadcasting, representing the new speech capability.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee wearing chunky headphones and speaking into a vintage silver microphone. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Colorful pixel sound waves floating in the air. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
